survey_name: Customer Satisfaction Survey for Subscription Box Services
survey_brief: This survey aims to gather feedback from customers about their satisfaction with subscription box services, including product quality, delivery experience, and overall value.

questions.question_text: How long have you been subscribed to the subscription box service?
questions.client_notes: Use a single-choice radio button format for clarity.

script.question_text: How long have you been subscribed to the subscription box service?

questions.question_text: How satisfied are you with the variety of products included in your subscription box?
questions.client_notes: Use a 5-point Likert scale for measuring satisfaction levels.

script.question_text: How satisfied are you with the variety of products included in your subscription box?

questions.question_text: Which of the following aspects of the subscription box do you value the most? (Select all that apply)
questions.client_notes: Allow multiple selections to capture diverse preferences.

script.question_text: Which of the following aspects of the subscription box do you value the most? (Select all that apply)

questions.question_text: How likely are you to recommend this subscription box service to a friend or colleague?
questions.client_notes: Use a standard NPS question format for recommendation likelihood.

script.question_text: How likely are you to recommend this subscription box service to a friend or colleague?

questions.question_text: Please share any additional feedback or suggestions for improving the subscription box service.
questions.client_notes: Open-ended question to capture qualitative feedback. Ensure the text box is mobile-friendly.

script.question_text: Please share any additional feedback or suggestions for improving the subscription box service.
